document.full_text: jamal crawford banked in a three-pointer with 5.7 seconds left to seal a 88-84 win for the atlanta hawks over the visiting orlando magic friday.
document.title: hawks swoop for late win as big guns boom
lines_and_colors: jamal crawford banked in a three-pointer with 5.7 seconds left to seal a 88-84 win for the atlanta hawks over the visiting orlando magic friday.
